tutorial.title: Tutorial
tutorial.subtitle: Learn how to use the NexTrade DAO platform

overview.title: NexTrade DAO Overview
overview.content: Welcome to NextTrade DAO, a decentralized trading platform that connects traditional finance with Web3, allowing you to earn NTX tokens through trading rebates, staking dividends, and community governance! We aim to build a transparent, efficient, and mutually beneficial trading ecosystem by partnering with major exchanges worldwide (such as Bitget, Binance, Bybit, etc.) through blockchain technology, AI optimization, SocialFi incentives, and real-world asset (RWA) investment.

audience.title: Target Audience
audience.content:
- Cryptocurrency trading beginners
- Users interested in blockchain, DeFi, and RWA investment
- Investors looking to earn additional income through rebates and staking

account.title: Account Setup and Exchange Binding
account.content:
1. Bind Exchange Account: Click [Mining] in the home navigation, enter the [Exchange] page, select and [Bind]. Then [Register] to jump to the exchange page to complete registration (Note: You must fill in the NexTrade DAO platform invitation code).

2. Get Exchange UID: Enter the exchange personal center page to get the UID, then return to the NexTrade DAO [Exchange] page to bind the UID, and you can start mining after completion.

3. Create/Connect Wallet: Users connect BSC chain compatible wallets to deposit and withdraw.

mining.title: Trading Mining and Rebate Mechanism
mining.content:
Token Production Rules:
- Total Token Supply: 3 billion
- Maximum Mining Output: 2.1 billion
- Initial Daily Minting: 383,561.64 NTX
- Daily Decrease: Years 1-20 deflation rate 5.48%;
- Years 21-50 deflation rate 9.81%
- Minting Duration: Approximately 50 years

Trading Mining Calculation Formula:

$$
M_a = \left(\frac{V_{0}}{V_{all}}\right) \times M \times 0.9
$$

where M_a is the user's daily token reward, V_0 is the user's daily trading volume, V_{all} is the platform's total daily trading volume, and M is the platform's daily token output.

Regular users who register exchange accounts through NexTrade DAO and trade will receive rebates in NTX tokens the next day, with a portion of tokens distributed to the referrer.

rebate.title: Rebate System
rebate.content: Understand the mechanism of earning rebates by referring friends.

staking.title: Staking and Dividends
staking.content: The platform offers two forms of staking: regular staking mining (repurchasing NTX to distribute interest) and liquidity provider (LP) staking (staking USDT and NTX in PancakeSwap V2 for weighted dividends) to enhance market liquidity.

governance.title: Community Participation and Governance
governance.content: We encourage users to participate in SocialFi activities and community governance. Activity on Telegram and Discord can accumulate points for rewards. Consuming NTX can forge GNTX governance tokens for participating in community decision voting. Holding GNTX and meeting invitation conditions can apply to become a broker and enjoy higher rebates.

academy.title: Academy System and Trading Strategies
academy.content: NexTrade DAO provides professional trading technology and marketing training, covering crypto trading strategies, Web3 marketing, and RWA investment knowledge. Users can exchange courses through USDT, NTX, or SocialFi contributions, aiming to improve user skills and enhance platform stickiness.

welcome.title: Welcome to NexTrade DAO
welcome.subtitle: World's First One-Stop Web3 Rebate Entrepreneurship Service Platform
